rules_text:
When Star Chart enters, you may search your library for a land card with a nonbasic land type, reveal it, then shuffle and put it on top.
[i]Frontier[/i] – {6}, {T}, Sacrifice Star Chart: Exile target nonland permanent. Activate only as a sorcery. This ability costs {2} less to activate if there are four or more land types among lands you control.
